archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Electronic Health Records
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Electronic Health Records (EHR)
• Purpose: Longitudinal patient health record spanning multiple care episodes and providers
• Core Functions:
o Comprehensive patient medical history o Clinical documentation and care planning o Medication management and allergy tracking o Problem lists and clinical decision support o Care coordination and referral management
• Data Scope: Multi-provider, multi-location, lifetime health record • Interoperability: HL7 FHIR, C-CDA documents, Direct Secure Messaging • Compliance: Meaningful Use/Promoting Interoperability, HIPAA, state regulations • Benefits: Improved care coordination, reduced medical errors, better outcomes
